name: Lonely UFO (NicoCcino)
description:
My first Ludum Dare game. I hope you like it!

All assets/code created by myself under 48h.

Feel free to share your high score (if you reached the final level)

Controls: 

Arrow keys / WASD = Move
Space = ?

Tools used:
Unity
Blender
Gimp
Bosca Ceoil
SFXR
Audacity
